name: Crystalpoint
description:
Crystalpoint is a game made in 72 hours for Mağara Jam #4. Jam's theme is CONTROL is your power.  As a hacker you force the system and what comes next happens to you! There are 2 endings for the game. If you have made all the endings let me know in the comments! ---- Controls ----

Enter = Skip

Mouse
